## Installation

Install from CRAN:

```r
install.packages("galah")
```

Install the development version from GitHub:

```r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("AtlasOfLivingAustralia/galah")
```

See the [README](https://github.com/AtlasOfLivingAustralia/galah/blob/master/README.md) for system requirements.

Load the package

```r
library(galah)
```

# Setting an Atlas
The living atlas community consists of a number of atlases that use a common 
computational infrastructure. Each atlas maintains its' own database containing
information relevant to them and their stakeholders. Currently, not all living 
atlases are supported in `galah`; but you can get a list of those that are using
`show_all_atlases`:


```r
show_all_atlases()
```

```
## # A tibble: 6 Ã— 3
##   atlas     taxonomy_source taxonomy_info                                                    
##   <chr>     <chr>           <chr>                                                            
## 1 Australia ALA             https://bie.ala.org.au/                                          
## 2 Austria   GBIF            https://www.gbif.org/dataset/d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c
## 3 Guatemala GBIF            https://www.gbif.org/dataset/d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c
## 4 Spain     GBIF            https://www.gbif.org/dataset/d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c
## 5 Sweden    GBIF            https://www.gbif.org/dataset/d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c
## 6 UK        NBN             https://www.nhm.ac.uk/our-science/data/uk-species.html
```

To chose one, use `galah_config()`:
  

```r
galah_config(atlas = "Spain")
galah_config(atlas = "Australia") # This is the default atlas
```
